type: Recyclage de bâtiments de tailles moyennes et grandes
department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
full_summary:
### **Medium/Large Vessel Recycling Services Tender Notice**
### **Rappel : Sur les marchés autochtones**

**Reference Number:** EVC01-202003/B  
**Project Title:** Medium/Large Vessel Recycling Services  
**Tender Closing Date:** Monday, March 15, 2024 2:00 PM (EST)  
**Publication Date:** Tuesday, March 04, 2024

The Public Works and Government Services Canada intends to establish supply arrangements with qualified suppliers to provide medium and large vessel recycling and disposal services across various regions in Canada.

**Scope of Work:**
The scope of work includes the recyclage and disposal of vessels requiring dismantlement in a recycling facility.

**Service Requirements:**
- **Stream A:** Medium-sized vessels with a lightship displacement of 300 MT or less.
- **Stream B:** Large-sized vessels with a lightship displacement of more than 300 MT.

**Solicitation Method:**
This solicitation is competitive, and all interested suppliers may submit a bid.

**Security Requirements:**
Certain security requirements may apply to some of the requirements in this solicitation. Suppliers should refer to the Contract Security Program of Public Works and Government Services Canada.

**Trade Agreements:**
This solicitation may be set-aside under the Trade Agreement for the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

**Tender Evaluation Criteria:**
The evaluation of bids will be based on the following criteria:
- **Qualification:**
- **Technical Proposal:**
- **Pricing:**

**Attachments:**
The solicitation documents are available in the Canada Buys website.

**Contact Information:**

*Name*: Major, Andrea  
*Email*: andrea.major@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca  
*Phone*: (403) 796-3230  
*Fax*: None  
*Address*: Place du Portage, Phase III, Tower c, 11 Laurier Street, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5

Note:

*This is an invitation to qualified suppliers to bid
